titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the right honourable Sir Henry Tulse, Lord Mayor, and the Court of Aldermen, and the citizens of the city of London, on May the 29th, 1684 being the anniversary-day of His Majesty's birth ... / by Thomas Sprat ...
titleStmt.author: Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.
Corporation of the Sons of the Clergy (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
